name: No one must know
description:
An arcade horror game made for the Dream Arcade Archive Jam.

They are coming closer. You can't let them know your secret.

You've manage to hide the evidence in a box... but it won't be enough to protect it. You'll have to block their view.

They say that all secrets end up being revealed. How long can you keep yours a secret?

Instructions:

Please report any bugs. This is a jam game, it was made quickly and without much testing.

If you liked this game, you'll probably enjoy my larger project Until it's undone
